name: Sunday, Early in the Morning
author: Marie-Laure Barret
kind: 32-bar strathspey for three couples in a three-couple longwise set

contents.content: All chase clockwise halfway round the set.

3rd, 2nd and 1st couples, giving right hand to partner, turn halfway,
release hands and, pulling right shoulder back, dance on a curve to
own sides of the set.
3rd and 2nd couples dance the Rose Progression.

description.more:
on July 31st, 2022. At the Saturday's ball at the end of the first week of
Summer School in St Andrews, a fellow candidate told me that it is planned
to write dances for our tutor, Rachel Shankland. Thus, on the following
morning, at 6.30 AM, I started devising this dance.
